title: Ka'sai
body: Anyone else think her passive damage is a bit on the silly side or am I imagining things

replies.body: Her whole kite deals to much dmg, i played today her first time and i ended up 23/6 when i have no idea about adc,  she is just basically spam q and use r if someone is on you XD

I do agree that her damage is too high right now, but she should still be higher than normal damage because she has no cc or team utility.  She definitely shouldn't be the highest damage though because she has pretty high utility for herself.
I mean the damage+utility combo is somewhat understandable seeing as she has a range of 525, though one of the two does need to be toned down currently
Yeah, I'm saying her damage does need to be toned down.  I just want to be clear that her damage shouldn't be gutted as that's all she provides for her team.

> Ka'Sai

Triggered

First off, its Kai'Sa not "Ka'Sai". I do agree that her kit does WAY too much damage (I'm M5 with her), riot isn't exactly nerfing the right things with her, the AP scaling on her is way too strong combined with a Q + W and {{item:3146}}, {{item:3124}} she'll basically burst you down before you can blink.
who the fuck builds gunblade on kaisa boi

Someone building survivability.
Its a hybrid AD/AP item type that provides healing.
That's right up Kai'Sa's alley.
so its a shitty deaths dance that nobody builds on kai'sa.

Except no.  It gives her a slow, turns her passive and W into large heals not just Q, and helps build both Q and W.
Build them both and she's hyper durable.  Like Akali.
build her full tank and shes durable like urgot, still not a good build though.
She won't be as durable as Urgot, because Urgot gets a massive shield on his W that scales with his max health.
with the normal urgot build kai'sa ultimate shield is higher than urgots w.
But Urgot also has resistances from his build + more base HP.

urgot has about 75~ base health more than kai'sa depending on level, if urgot and kai'sa actually went the same build kai'sa would have more health in a fight if you count the shield but urgot would have a bit more resistances, generally speaking both would be of similar durability though.
Urgot builds Cleaver and Mallet. Those two items alone grant him 1100 HP.
you are somehow ignoring the first post you were responding to about builds.
Cept for the part where Gunblade is a good Item on Kai'Sa.
feel free to show me one good kai'sa player that builds gunblade on her.

*implying that who you are arguing with is a bad player*

{{item:3146}}  is a strong item, esp on hybrid damage dealers, {{champion:55}} {{champion:84}} ..hell even {{champion:96}} can abuse it even before {{item:3124}} gave onhit based on your ad and ap now its just insane coupled with {{item:3124}}

im implying that if it was the optimal build diamonds, challengers and pro players would be building it and not only bronze-gold on the boards, but if you want to tell me that the people who have professional analysts that make a living out of optimizing everything are wrong and the "casual" players are right feel free to tell me i'm wrong.

its . . . not shitty though? given that her q and w both scale with ap and ad ontop of her passive giving her abit of on hit magic damage. and then her execute ap damage that your going to get off no matter what. add on the fuck tons of omnivamp her W gives her its . .. not terrible. i wont say viable. but defintly not terrible. also the active hurts so you know thats good too
Like all they said, but once again: her problem isn't in the AD scaling, its the AP scaling. full AD kai'sa is so bad because you can't melt tanks like you do with hybrid
and yet no one thats decent at the game and kai'sa builds this item on her.
I do, and I get tons of kills each game lmfao
i mean not to rank shame or anything but surely you wouldn't claim to be good at kaisa when you are bronze with 1 ranked game played on her with 12 deaths and 6 kills.
Because i just got ranked lol, check my normal games as her.
your normal games are around the same MMR as your rank, well a tad bit higher but not much.
Her shield scaling is too high to begin with.
her shield is fine considering its an ulti

It's not fine. It shouldn't be shield in the first place anyway. Just a dash with some effect but not shield. Not in the meta where shielding is already cancerous. Additionally Kaisa was supposed to be high risk high reward. Where is the risk where she fires long range skillshot from half the map. Then dashes to a victim with huge shield and can also stealth. Much risk. So much risk omg. This is low risk low reward champion. She is a stat check and safe.
mastery means nothing
It’s not only the amount of damage but the frequency it is applied.

She got her entire kit buffed in ONE patch over, + passive.

She just deals too much dmg in all fucking regards.
who the fuck is ka'sai
the new avatar in book 5

> [{quoted}](name=TempName74814,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xEdMB9K4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-28T22:20:55.627+0000)
>
> who the fuck is ka'sai

Kai’Sa but she only growls, screeches, and roars.
she's just a massive stat check, with lots of free stats provided

The worst thing about Kaisa is how she can stay safe like a typical ADC, pump out quite a lot of damage like a typical ADC, but on top of that, she can pick a chance as an assassin and kill the backline almost instantly. Seeing how ADCs usually murder people after a point (4-5 items), having the ability to move anywhere close to a target and pop them, while being able to play safely as an ADC, is broken. What makes this even worse is that she also gains a HUGE shield when she moves in, so even a smart enemy team will have trouble killing her before she kills everyone.

But the real worst thing about her is if there's a Morgana in the team. Right before she goes in, Morg shields her. Thefore, the enemy can't damage her because of her own shield, can't cc her because of black shield and can't survive because of the insane DPS.
I think its pretty balanced at the moment.
53% winrate

I think it gives her too much mixed damage.  Either her passive needs to be switched to physical damage or her Q to magic damage (I would prefer the second option because Death's Dance is strong on her right now.

She is a fial champion design...
They wanted to make her adaptive, but nothing is stopping her from getting upto all of her level ups and still burst you down.
Specially her Q just have to much base damage

I saw a Talon jumping over a wall to assassinate her... Kai'sa pressed Q and Talon was gone... She was not even fed, but Talon was

I felt sorry for enemy team they won three lanes, their mid-top-jungle won and it didn't mattered a bit.

> https://imgur.com/a/dxKtIxL
Oh, don't worry, the nerf is coming. :) Our team's Irelia is already crying over his main.
It chunks too much early game for sure, there's almost no loss in the early levels in terms of scaling.

bro 20% missing hp damage is weak...that why it need such a good ratio that goes up to 30% with just rageblade

Bro she is weak i mean what if lee sin need to land a skill shot just to have 8% FLAT missing hp ? Kaisa have it as her passive make her weak cause with so much damage she is always on perma ban status
